Sentencas: Ceramic-metal composites (cermets) containing yttria-stabilized zirconia(YSZ) and Ni particles as anode materials in solid oxide fuel cells were prepared by a new method.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The method encompasses nickel oxalate dihydrate precipitation on the nanometre YSZ powder, and decomposition at 633 K in inert atmosphere.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The composite powders containing 30, 40, and 50% Ni manufactured by the oxalate method were compacted into disk pellets, and sintered in Ar containing 10% H-2.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The structure of the cermet materials was characterized by means of X-ray diffractometry (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), and mercury porosimetry.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) was determined by the dilatometric method.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) was used to determine electrical conductivity.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials

Sentencas: The oxalate method leads to obtaining the Ni/YSZ anodes with the Ni content reduced to 40 wt% and well obeying based requirements for anode material in SOFCs.
Titulo: A new method of preparing Ni/YSZ cermet materials
